channel.title: Products on PlaceOS
channel.description: Recent content in Products on PlaceOS

item.title: WorkMate
item.description: The first workplace management system to combine out-of-the-box simplicity with enterprise-level configuration & scalability

item.title: StageHand
item.description: Control every AV device in every room on campus — from your browser

item.title: LensPath
item.description: The no-code computer vision ai tool that turns any camera feed into real-time actions

item.title: BackOffice
item.description: Command your entire smart environment in one place

item.title: HVAC Automation
item.description: Control HVAC based on real occupancy — without replacing your existing system

item.title: Occupancy Monitoring System
item.description: A self-hosted occupancy monitoring system that works with the infrastructure you already have — no new sensors needed.

item.title: Visitor Management
item.description: Visitor management software so simple, the only thing you do is send the invite, it does everything else

item.title: Room Booking
item.description: A simple, self-hosted room booking app you don’t pay per room per month, you own it

item.title: Desk Booking
item.description: Configurable desk booking management at scale without hardware lock-in

item.title: VirtualCare
item.description: Gives clinicians, carers, and patients one system to manage consults, surveys, referrals, Medicare billing, education, and follow-ups — no plugins or patchwork tools.
